summary: Frontend-only testing for MensajesHoy.jsx refactoring. Build successful, all components pass ESLint, no JavaScript errors on page load. Google OAuth required for full UI testing.
critical_code_review_comments: Refactoring successful: Original 3097-line file split into 12 files totaling 3007 lines
Main MensajesHoy.jsx reduced from 3097 to 426 lines - clean separation of concerns
All tab components (WhatsApp, LinkedIn, Email) properly extracted with their own state management
Dialog components (AddPhone, AddLinkedin, EmailPreview, GeneratedUrls) properly isolated
Shared utilities (constants.js, utils.js, PaginationControls.jsx) promote code reuse
All imports/exports correctly configured in index.js barrel file
data-testid attributes present on key elements for testing

test_credentials.note: Google OAuth required - @leaderlix.com domain users only

context_for_next_testing_agent: MensajesHoy.jsx refactoring verified. The file was split from 3097 lines into 12 modular files. All components pass ESLint. Build completes successfully. Frontend loads without JavaScript errors. Full UI testing requires Google OAuth authentication with @leaderlix.com domain.

components_created.purpose: WhatsApp tab with contact search, diagnosis, and message generation
LinkedIn tab with contact grouping by persona/keyword
Email tab with E1-E4 rule-based contact management

page_load.description: Frontend loads without JavaScript errors, login page displayed (OAuth required)
